products.title: Our Robot Range
products.subtitle: A complete family of autonomous robotic systems for all your operational needs

products.title: Tunnel Rat (TRat)
products.description: Compact ground robot for reconnaissance, surveillance, and special operations. Can be equipped with explosives or Waldo systems.

products.title: Super Rat
products.description: Reinforced version of the Tunnel Rat with extended capabilities and superior payload for complex missions.

products.title: Pivot MUGV
products.description: Versatile amphibious vehicle capable of land and water operations. Compatible with all Waldo systems.

products.title: Small Waldo (SWaldo)
products.description: Compact PTU for ISR with mechanical zoom camera and IR/thermal sensors. Perfect for discreet mounting.

products.title: Medium Waldo (MWaldo)
products.description: Intermediate PTU for advanced ISR systems and ISR+ applications. Compatible with light armament.

products.title: Large Waldo (LWaldo)
products.description: High-performance PTU for heavy armament and complete ISR systems. 24V magnetic encoder motors.

products.title: Valkyrie
products.description: Vision-guided kamikaze drone with integrated Aimbot system. Capable of autonomous reconnaissance and target engagement.

products.title: Smart Mine
products.specs: Type: UGV + Aimbot | Mode: Intelligent Kamikaze
products.description: Mobile intelligent mine using Aimbot for autonomous identification and pursuit of specific targets.

products.title: Badger
products.description: All-terrain vehicle with pan/tilt turret capable of carrying and firing weapons up to .308 caliber.

products.title: Icarus
products.description: Laser-guided kamikaze drone with anti-sniper maneuvers and autonomous search capabilities for marked targets.

products.title: Argos
products.description: Version of Aimbot using a quadrant detector for laser guidance instead of the traditional vision system.

technology.title: Aimbot Technology
technology.subtitle: Our revolutionary artificial intelligence software at the heart of all our systems
technology.description: Aimbot is our proprietary computer vision software that uses deep learning to revolutionize the autonomous capabilities of our robots.

features.title: 1. Object Classification
features.description: Automatic identification and classification of objects in the field of view in real-time.

features.title: 2. Target Tracking
features.description: Autonomous and continuous tracking of selected objects with trajectory prediction.

features.title: 3. Specialized Search
features.description: Active search for specific target classes according to mission parameters.
